references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational EXP4 algorithm, which is a cornerstone of the adversarial multi-armed bandit setting and is directly extended in this work.
This paper studies the abstention option in the standard (context-free) adversarial bandit setting, providing a basis for extending the concept to contextual bandits.

references.paper_title: Using and combining predictors that specialize
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of specialist predictors, which are a core component in confidence-rated predictors and are directly used in this work's analysis.
This paper introduces the GABA algorithm, which is a key competitor to the algorithm proposed in this work and is used as a baseline in the experimental analysis.
This book provides a comprehensive overview of bandit algorithms, which serves as a valuable resource for understanding the contextual and adversarial bandit setting examined in this work.
